ygData.subject: Greetings All
ygData.msgSnippet: New to Tavern. 46 year old lady from Kansas. Plays majority of time on Drinal server. Main is level 40 halfling druid named Charai Bandroichta ( it means
ygData.messageBody:
New to Tavern.

46 year old lady from Kansas. Plays majority of time on Drinal server.
Main is level 40 halfling druid named Charai Bandroichta ( it means
friend druid in Gaellic)

Also have a level 25 wood elf warrior Named Athynna Darling "Who said
it was going to be easy?"

Jovvi Songangel my half elf bard (did you see that one coming?)

Whyyte Lyyte the human monk

Lafou Fraugge froglok shaman

Minniey Mausch dwarven pally

and

Tymthyn - High Elf Enchanter

I think I need a life. WAIT I have at least 7 of them ! NM.

ttfn
